original_text: And as soon as David had made an end of offering burnt offerings and peace offerings, he blessed the people in the name of the Lord of hosts.
korean_text: 다윗이 번제와 화목제 드리기를 마치고 만군의 여호와의 이름으로 백성에게 축복하고

sentences.original_text: And as soon as David had made an end of offering burnt offerings
in the name of the Lord of hosts.
